name: @biconomy/abstractjs
description: Experimental Developer Access to Biconomy MEE
author: Biconomy

scripts.changeset:release:canary: original_name=$(bun run scripts/publish:canary.ts | grep ORIGINAL_NAME | cut -d'=' -f2) && npm publish && git checkout package.json && git tag -l '*-canary.*' | xargs git tag -d && git fetch --tags && git reset --hard && git clean -fd && echo "Published canary version of $original_name as latest"
scripts.build: bun run build:types && bun run build:js
